channel.title: Hyphen 317
channel.description:
[b][url=http://www.runefocus.netau.net]RuneFocus[/url][/b] has been [b]finished[/b], we are probably going to release it in few days, or even maybe today, and RuneFocus isn't going to be released as a RS-remake though. I'm still working on the [b]Osiris[/b] framework project, I'm a[b] multi-task person[/b], so why not. Me and Martin, aka ld est ld are working on this project. It's based off BattleScape, we're using the Tempest source tbh. We're not going to re-create the old RuneScape, we're only going to partly re-create it, so don't take this as a RS remake. We're going to make few minigames, quests and we're going to work on all skills. We're going to have the old-school runescape website too. [hr] Goals:
[ul][li]All skills[/li] [li]Perfect PVP/PVN system[/li] [li]Clipping[/li] [li]Deposit Box[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Old school website[/li] [li]Cook's assistant[/li] [li]Witch's poison[/li] [li]Sheep shearer[/li][/ul] Update log: [code] Working on the skill menus, finishing the items on interface part Deposit boxes - started [/code]
Developers:
[ul][li]Diego (me)[/li] [li]Martin (ld est ld)[/li][/ul]

item.title: Hyphen 317
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:37, topic:418315”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=520860.msg3784207#msg3784207 date=1318721680]

Just another rolled deep project.
[/quote]What’s that supposed to mean?

It means you do things half-assed. I’d like to see you stick to a project instead of spreading content that could’ve gone inside that project. If you’re trying to release as many sources with the same thing over and over again so that your popularity as a programmer will rise, then you don’t really deserve to be getting praise for any of your developments.

Your projects:
Your iClarity project that I forgot
Rune Focus
Osiris
Orisis 194
Osiris 213942853046952391284350 (You have like 5 versions of it.)
Subsonic
and lastly
this.

I probably missed some because you’ve developed some others AFAIK.

I’d be much more impressed with you as a developer if you just stuck to one project at a time and dedicated yourself to that project instead of placing a large workload on yourself. You sound motivated for your projects that you start, so it doesn’t seem like you’re getting bored.

Also, all of you who are arguing should shut up. You’re not helping yourselves or Roll Deep.

And while I’m on the subject:
Good work on the Osiris project. It looks clean and nice but I wish you wouldn’t spring up so many projects.

^^I could not stress what he said more.

List of threads in Server Development:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


Bout halfway down.

Another project he was included:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


xEpicz, lately changed to runefocus has been finished. Osiris scratch framework #edition 1 finished, osiris 194 look a like finished, project blessed of me and native has been finished, basillius and the xsocket framework was stopped.

Read full topic

I probably missed some because you’ve developed some others AFAIK.

I’d be much more impressed with you as a developer if you just stuck to one project at a time and dedicated yourself to that project instead of placing a large workload on yourself. You sound motivated for your projects that you start, so it doesn’t seem like you’re getting bored.

And while I’m on the subject:
Good work on the Osiris project. It looks clean and nice but I wish you wouldn’t spring up so many projects.[/quote]
Thanks, I thought you hate me though. Btw, I’ve been working with iClarity, RuneSource and stuff only to improve the usage of it and to improve my java knowledge. That are the 2 main reasons, and yea I have been releasing half-assed things, but there’s 90% people without making a project thread that release half-assed things. I like that people know what am I working on atm. So yeah, I guess thanks for the feedback

Also to chop at another person intelligence you must not be that smart yourself. Now go hop on your short bus and don’t forget the helmet and the colouring book by the door.

1: LOL

my bad bro
